text: Bruce Mandeville (born 3 May 1960) is a Canadian equestrian. He competed at the 2000 Summer Olympics and the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Canada Category:Equestrians at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in equestrian Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Canada Category:Equestrians at the 2003 Pan American Games Category:Sportspeople from New Westminster
title: Bruce Mandeville
